DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess predictive ability three asthma risk marker : ratio controller medication total asthma medication , albuterol marker , oral corticosteroid use marker , well compare precision tool adult pediatric patient population . This retrospective longitudinal analysis use 2 different database : large manage care database large fee service Medicaid database .
DOC.brief_title: Predictive Ability Therapeutic Risk Factors Pediatric Adult Asthma Patients
DOC.criteria: Subjects asthma determine ICD9 code asthma drug use least 4 year age use least 1 controller least 5 albuterol prescription 12 month Subjects COPD treatment COPD
